abstract: Profit was down 8.4 percent but the company continued to have strong growth in wireless and broadband subscriptions.
snippet: Profit was down 8.4 percent but the company continued to have strong growth in wireless and broadband subscriptions.
lead_paragraph: Merger costs and the divestiture of some businesses drove Verizon’s profit down 8.4 percent in the first quarter, but the company continued to have strong growth in wireless and broadband subscriptions.

headline.main: Costs and Divestitures Cut Verizon's Profit
headline.print_headline: Costs and Divestitures Cut Verizon’s Profit
